attributes.action: Profit Interest Tax to Fuel & Energy Companies
attributes.additional_details: Due to very high profits is made every year by UK  Fuel & Energy Companies taxing them with Profit Interest Tax because the energy wholesale prices is very low but putting very high charges to there customers as a energy customers or car drivers on the UK Fuel Forecourts when they are putting in there vehicles every day. Also all big UK Energy Suppliers bill customers by using the night time meter readings in day & day time readings at night instead thats they are charging UK Customers with Higher Energy Bills.
